name: kTron
content_security_policy: default-src 'self' https://* http://* data: gap: https://ssl.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' wss://www.onirom.fr:2891 https://*.gamedistribution.com http://* https://*; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; media-src *
